import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Row, Col, TimePicker, Button, Radio, Divider, Card, Checkbox, Select } from "antd"; import moment from "moment"; import { Link } from "@reach/router"; export const StepTempo = () => { const { Option } = Select; const [bool, setBool] = useState(true); const [selectedOptions, setPlainOptions] = useState(""); const [selectedWeek, setSelectedWeek] = useState(""); const option = [ { label: "Codizione temporale", value: "Codizione temporale" }, { label: "Sempre", value: "Sempre" } ]; const week = [ { label: "Lun", value: "Lun" }, { label: "Mar", value: "Mar" }, { label: "Mer", value: "Mer" }, { label: "Gio", value: "Gio" }, { label: "Ven", value: "Ven" }, { label: "Sab", value: "Sab" }, { label: "Dom", value: "dom" } ]; const format = "HH:mm"; const onChangeOption = e => { console.log("radio1 checked", e.target.value); setPlainOptions(e.target.value); setBool(true); }; const onChangeWeek = e => { setSelectedWeek(e); }; const handleChange = value => { console.log(`selected ${value}`); }; return (
